mapper.select: SELECT p.POST_KEY AS postKey, p.POST_TITLE AS postTitle, p.POST_CONTENT AS postContent, p.POST_REGDATE AS postRegdate, p.USER_KEY AS userKey, u.USER_NAME AS userName, f.file_path AS profileImageUrl FROM post p JOIN user u ON p.USER_KEY = u.USER_KEY LEFT JOIN ( SELECT file_path, user_key FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY user_key ORDER BY file_regdate DESC) AS rn FROM files WHERE file_path LIKE '/upload/%' ) t WHERE rn = 1 ) f ON f.user_key = u.user_key ORDER BY p.POST_KEY DESC

SELECT p.POST_KEY AS postKey, p.POST_TITLE AS postTitle, p.POST_CONTENT AS postContent, p.POST_REGDATE AS postRegdate, p.USER_KEY AS userKey, u.USER_NAME AS `userName` -- u.KINDER_NAME AS kinderName FROM post p JOIN user u ON p.USER_KEY = u.USER_KEY WHERE p.POST_KEY = #{postKey}
select c.*, u.USER_NAME as userName from comment c left join user u on c.USER_KEY = u.USER_KEY where POST_KEY = #{postKey}
